body: Sketches on 218 and 219 were parts that he cut out, specifically from Chapter 3. So I wouldn't get my hopes up for a continuation, Seto has indicated that he wants to move on.
This was a great work would love more
kebanyakan sih reupload . tapi ini menurutku yg rapi dan enak di baca.
The sketches of 218 and 219 are a possible indication the story will continue, but it all depends on the author and publisher. As a fan, I hope for more. Just have to wait and see what happens.
Seto next project look like an orgy, cant wait.

One of my fav ntr's but i feel it is incomplete, even tho he did not get chitose, seto should let mc fuck at least once and have chitose choose gorilla cause he is her bf. He moved on like a champ tho and got hot sis as a fuck buddy, idk why seto made a new female character and not build her up at all. The sketches gave me hope he make another but those might be sketches that did not make it to the last chapter. Hope this animated it deserves one. They can make two episodes and fit two chapters in one easy if they did it right
I really like this one but I also feel it could have done more
Are those on page 218 , 219 sketches for part 2
This story teaches us once again that no matter how nice and attentive you are and a good person... in the end the girl you like stays with the gorilla who treats her like a rag XD
